mapper.select: select p.optypenum, p.optypename from tbbcoptype p where p.opgroupcode=#{opgroupcode} and p.isuse=1 order by p.optypenum
select t.oppartnum,t.oppartname from tbbcoppart t where t.optypenum=#{optypenum} and t.isuse=1 order by t.oppartnum
call up_GetReceiveUserList(#{userList, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=userMap}, #{isuccess, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER})

call up_RecList( #{sUserNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOPGROUPCODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOPTYPENUM, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOPPARTNUM, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sBarCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sRecNumGather, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iBATCHNUM, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{StartDate, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EndDate, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iFilterMode, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecUserNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ischecked, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sRECSTATECODE, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iStart, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iEnd, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{IsEspacial, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iStep, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bSuccess, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iCount, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RCSurface, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=projectMap} )

call up_logicid_disp( #{iOpTypeNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sPage, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sMsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

call up_LockRecOrNot( #{iOpTypeNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iUserNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iType, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sMsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iSuccess, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

select OWNERNUM,OpTypeNum,RecYear,RecNum,OWNERNAME, chengjiandw,PROJNAME,PROJSIT,STARTDATE,ENDDATE,CELLCOUNT,ARCHITAREA,GUIHUACERTNUM,SHIGONGCERTNUM,RONGJILV,JIANZHUGUIMO from rwrecowner t where OpTypeNum = #{OpTypeNum} and RecYear=#{RecYear} and RecNum=#{RecNum} and OWNERNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE rwrecowner SET OWNERNUM = #{OWNERNUM}, OWNERNAME = #{OWNERNAME}, chengjiandw = #{chengjiandw}, PROJNAME = #{PROJNAME}, PROJSIT = #{PROJSIT}, STARTDATE = #{STARTDATE}, ENDDATE = #{ENDDATE}, CELLCOUNT = #{CELLCOUNT,jdbcType=NULL}, ARCHITAREA = #{ARCHITAREA,jdbcType=NULL}, GUIHUACERTNUM = #{GUIHUACERTNUM}, SHIGONGCERTNUM = #{SHIGONGCERTNUM}, RONGJILV = #{RONGJILV}, JIANZHUGUIMO = #{JIANZHUGUIMO} WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OpTypeNum} and RecYear=#{RecYear} and RecNum=#{RecNum} and OWNERNUM = 1
mapper.select: call up_CreateNewRec( #{iOpTypeNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpPartNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iUserNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iYear,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iMaxRecNum,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT * FROM RWRECOWNER WHERE OPTYPENUM = #{OPTYPENUM} AND RECYEAR = #{RECYEAR} AND RECNUM = #{RECNUM} AND OWNERNUM = 1

call up_GetRecMat( #{iOpTypeNum,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{IsReadOnly, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{curRec, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=nodeMap} )
select i.imageid from RWRECMATIMAGE m,bzfimage.Tbbwimage i where optypenum= #{optypenum} and recyear= #{recyear} and recnum= #{recnum} and recmatnum = #{recmatnum} and m.imagedescid = i.imagedescid

call up_GetRecSendTarget( #{iSendType, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpTypeNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iState , mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOPSENDTARGETTYPE , mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sRECNUMGATHER , mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RCRecSendTarget , mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR,resultMap=sendTargetMap} )

{call up_SendRecToTarget( #{iSendType, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpTypeNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpFCNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpFCVer, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOpFlowPhNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOPFuncNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iOPFuncIsUseProm , mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iISRETURN , mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iLockUserNum , mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iLoclUserNum , mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iCurRecWorkPhaseNum , mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srecnumgather , mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iState , mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
mapper.update:
UPDATE RWRECOWNER set OWNERNAME = #{applicantName}, OWNERSEXCODE = #{applicantSex}, marriedornot = #{applicantMarry}, ownerage = #{applicantAge}, OWNERUNIT = #{applicantWork}, NATIVEPLACE = #{applicantResidence}, OWNERADDRESS = #{applicantAdress}, housepropcode = #{applicantNature}, ownerincome = #{applicantIncome},
TELCODE = #{applicantPhone}, OWNERCERTTYPECODE = #{OWNERCERTTYPECODE}, owneraddressother = #{applicantOtherHouse}, residence_time = #{applicantResidenceTime}, OWNERCERTNUM = #{applicantCard} WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OPTYPENUM} and RecYear=#{RECYEAR} and RecNum=#{RECNUM}

UPDATE RWRECWORKPHASE set workOpinion = #{workOpinion}, execusernum = #{approver.id}, worktime = SYSDATE WHERE optypenum = #{optypenum} and RecYear=#{recyear} and RecNum=#{recnum} and RECWORKPHASENUM = #{RECWORKPHASENUM}

UPDATE RWRECWORKPHASE set returntype = #{returnType}, returnReason = #{returnReason}, execusernum = #{approver.id}, worktime = SYSDATE WHERE optypenum = #{optypenum} and RecYear=#{recyear} and RecNum=#{recnum} and RECWORKPHASENUM = #{RECWORKPHASENUM}
mapper.delete: DELETE from RWRECOWNERFAMILY WHERE OpTypeNum = #{iOptypenum} and RecYear=#{iRecyear} and RecNum=#{iRecnum}
mapper.select: SELECT * from RWRECOWNERFAMILY WHERE OpTypeNum = #{iOptypenum} and RecYear=#{iRecyear} and RecNum=#{iRecnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE RWRECOWNER set district_BZF = #{regional}, appplytype_BZF = #{application_mode}, housetype_BZF = #{apartment}, reason = #{reason}, promise_applicant = #{promise_applicant}, promise_spouse = #{promise_spouse}, promise_time = #{promise_time} WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OPTYPENUM} and RecYear=#{RECYEAR} and RecNum=#{RECNUM}
mapper.select: SELECT houseId from RWRECRECEIVE WHERE OPTYPENUM = #{OPTYPENUM} AND RECYEAR = #{RECYEAR} AND RECNUM = #{RECNUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE RWRECRECEIVE set houseId = #{checkHouseId}, VALIDBEGINDATE = sysdate WHERE OpTypeNum = #{iOpTypeNum} and RecYear=#{iRecYear} and RecNum=#{iRecNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT buildId as "projectId",SITBUILDNUM as "buildNum" FROM TBBWDIAGRAMBUILD WHERE BUILDIDTEMP < 0 AND BUILDIDTEMP IS NOT NULL
AND SITBUILDNUM LIKE '%${projectName}%'

call up_Getrwrecreceiveinfo1( #{iOpTypeNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecYear, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iRecNum, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sOWNERCERTNUM, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iSuccess, mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sMsg, mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RWRECOWNER set OWNERNAME_PEIOU = #{OWNERNAME_PEIOU}, OWNERSEXCODE_PEIOU = #{OWNERSEXCODE_PEIOU}, OWNERCERTTYPECODE_PEIOU = #{OWNERCERTTYPECODE_PEIOU}, OWNERCERTNUM_PEIOU = #{OWNERCERTNUM_PEIOU} WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OPTYPENUM} and RecYear=#{RECYEAR} and RecNum=#{RECNUM}
mapper.select: SELECT * from RWRECOWNERFAMILY WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OPTYPENUM} and RecYear=#{RECYEAR} and RecNum=#{RECNUM} and FamilyID = #{FamilyID}
mapper.update: UPDATE RWRECOWNER SET civil_servant = 1 WHERE OPTYPENUM = #{OPTYPENUM} AND RECYEAR = #{RECYEAR} AND RECNUM = #{RECNUM}
UPDATE rwrecinfo SET recstatecode = '0' WHERE OpTypeNum = #{OPTYPENUM} and RecYear=#{RECYEAR} and RecNum=#{RECNUM}
mapper.select: SELECT PEOPLE_STATUS FROM RWRECOWNER WHERE OWNERCERTNUM = #{idCard}

SELECT RCI.OPPARTNUM as 保障房类型, TBH.SITDOORNUM as 房号, TBH.ARCHITAREA as 建筑面积, TBH.ROOMAREA as 套内面积, RCO.TELCODE as 联系电话, BZFP.ADDRESS as 项目地址, BZFP."NAME" as 项目名称 FROM RWRECOWNER RCO, RWRECRECEIVE RCRC, TBBWDIAGRAMHOUSE TBH, RWRECINFO RCI, BZF_PROJECT BZFP, TBBWDIAGRAMBUILD TBB WHERE RCO.OWNERCERTNUM = #{idCard} AND RCO.PEOPLE_STATUS = '3' AND RCO.OPTYPENUM = RCI.OPTYPENUM AND RCO.RECYEAR = RCI.RECYEAR AND RCO.RECNUM = RCI.RECNUM AND RCO.OPTYPENUM = RCRC.OPTYPENUM AND RCO.RECYEAR = RCRC.RECYEAR AND RCO.RECNUM = RCRC.RECNUM AND RCRC.HOUSEID = TBH.HOUSEID AND TBH.BUILDID = TBB.BUILDID AND TBB.BUILDIDTEMP = BZFP.BUILD_RECEIVE
SELECT * FROM TBBWIMPORT WHERE col3=#{id} and 1>=rownum
